body:
Well my final exam is around the corner, so I need to stay focused on my studies. I am asking a really weird favor but can you ban me until wednesday 12pm so I don't get distracted from studying. I'm faling the class because it's horribly boring and uninteresting and I can't stay focused in class because I'll fall asleep after five minutes of his FOUR HOUR LECTURE.


For the reason can you say "Go Study" and at the end of the ban can you appeal it so it looks nice on my profile <3

Thanks.
